title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1230/82 of 19 May 1982 laying down special detailed rules for the system of import licences for products falling within subheading 07.06 A of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1230/82
of 19 May 1982
laying down special detailed rules for the system of import licences for products falling within subheading 07.06 A of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The country of origin shall be entered in Section 14 of applications for licences and of import licences for products falling within subheading 07.06 A of the Common Customs Tariff. The licence shall carry the obligation to import products originating in the country stated.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 May 1982.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 281, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 382, 31. 12. 1981, p. 37.
(3) OJ No L 213, 11. 8. 1975, p. 5.
(4) OJ No L 35, 7. 2. 1981, p. 15.
